TestDescription.name: Apache Axis2 information disclosure
TestDescription.Description: Apache Axis2 installation includes a JSP page accessible at [dark]axis2-web/HappyAxis.jsp[/dark] that discloses at lot of sensitive information. An attacker could use this information to conduct further attacks.
TestDescription.Impact: An attacker could use this information to conduct further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: If you don't want this information to be publicly accessible you need to restrict access to the [dark]/axis2-web/[/dark] directory.
